title: How will Apple use 5G technology to corner the market? - Quora

response.answer_text: They're not using 5G and has no plans yet. Qualcomm owns most of the patents of 5G and Apple hates Qualcomm and isn't getting along with them. Apple is probably doing the right thing and waiting for a while until 5G is more mainstream because they don't think the investment right now is worth it.. if their top of the line iPhone like the iPhone 11 Pro Max had 5G, it would cost $1500 and no one would buy it. So right now, Apple is using the strategy they always use which is slowly release technology over the years and wait until other companies invent technologies and features then they would use that same feature on their phones at a later time. Apple has yet to have an under the screen fingerprint scanner.

Apple will implement 5G modems in their iPhones and the rumour is for the 2020 models. They want to make sure it is ready and efficient for use in the systems before pushing out an unoptimised product. Apple iPhones have consistently been in the top 10 best selling model smartphone and again in 2019 they got top spot as the best selling model smartphone world wide. So when they put them in their smartphones they will also have a millions of people using 5G smartphones all at once. Link; Can you guess which smartphone was the most popular worldwide for 2019?
